item.description: Study How To Build A Blog New A Post ( •̀ .̫ •́ )✧ Run the code in order in the PowerShell: cd D:/html D:/hugo_dir/hugo new post/fileName.md Push To Github (｡･ω･｡)ﾉ♡ Run the code in order in the PowerShell: D:/hugo_dir/hugo cd public git add . git commit -m "test" git push origin main

item.title: My First Blog
item.description: Hello Serendpity’s Blog This is the Serendpity’s first blog post. Love you all! ( •̀ ω •́ )y
